name: googlerecaptcha
author: Ujjwal Rajpal and Aftab Alam

sections.description: A google recaptcha for user login admin page.One can use it to authenticate a bot.It can be used only at admin login page.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.
1. Create a folder googlerecaptcha in /wp-content/plugins/ directory
2. Upload to the files in it.
3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where did i get the site key and site secret?

Ans: steps to followed:
-> Go to site https://www.google.com/recaptcha/admin
-> Register for captcha and you will get your site key and secret
-> Enter the key and secret in setting of plugin

* Be carefull while entering key and secret
